ItemTooltip.CelestialSigil:
Calls apon the Third Impact 
 'It all returns to nothing.'
ItemTooltip.LunarFlareBook: Rains down a hail of light summoned by Lilith
ItemTooltip.MoonlordTurretStaff: Summons an Angel's portal to shoot lasers at your enemies
ItemTooltip.MoonlordArrow: 'An arrow covered in the blood of Lilith.'
ItemTooltip.MoonlordBullet: 'A bullet filled with the essence of Lilith.'
ItemTooltip.MoonLordPainting: A painting of the second angel.
ItemTooltip.Void Monolith: Void: 'Harness a small amount of power from the Lilith'
ItemTooltip.LunarCraftingStation: Used to craft items from Lilith

BuffDescription.MoonLeech: You are unable to absorb healing effects
BuffDescription.LunaticCultistPet: It keeps looking at the Moon

Bestiary_FlavorText.npc_MoonLordCore: Lilith's arrival on Earth was an accident, freed from her empyreal prison. Practically a god, her power knows no limits.
